name: CodingAgent
description: Generates, analyzes, debugs, and optimizes code based on user requests in English. Can execute Python code.

skills.name: Code Generation
skills.description: Generates code snippets or full programs based on natural language descriptions.
examples: Write a python function to calculate factorial.
Create a simple flask web server.

skills.name: Code Analysis
skills.description: Analyzes provided code for errors, style issues, or explains its functionality.

skills.name: Code Execution
skills.description: Executes provided Python code snippets and returns the output.
